page.title: 15Tourism in Sennen
page.content: The tourist trade in Sennen affects the life of the village in several ways.Perhaps the most noticeable effect is on family life.As many of the local people rely on the tourist trade to earn their living, it means that many of them are at their busiest when the majority of people are on holiday.Of course this in turn means that the people of Sennen must try to take their holidays in the winter,not always easy,especially for those with families. Another effect of the tourist trade is that many of the houses are only occup ied during the summer months.This has become very apparent as we have carr ied out house to house surveys in the area.It is also interesting to note that none of the schoolchildren come from the Cove- most of the houses being retirement homes or summer lets.
